subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: George McNeill birdied his last three holes for a three-under-par 69 to rally past Ryo Ishikawa of Japan and win the Puerto Rico Open in Rio Grande by two shots at 272.
snippet: George McNeill birdied his last three holes for a three-under-par 69 to rally past Ryo Ishikawa of Japan and win the Puerto Rico Open in Rio Grande by two shots at 272.
